dialogue: "Drain lords!" Hundreds of them, Tara... coming out of the drains!
It's Mr. Melancholy! It's just a trick.
How am I ever going to shower again?!
--They can't hurt you if you don't think about them. They can't hurt you if you don't think about them!
His henchmen are close by. I can feel them.
Marco and Polo. Nasty little demons.
And he... He's...
Mr. Melancholy.
That's right.
What is happening to me? How do I know these things?
Am I going crazy?
No. Never let anyone convince you of that.
You're like me. You're special.
We are The Pink Opaque. It's our destiny.
I knew it from the moment I first saw you in the dining hall. Heck, I knew it before I even met you...
I don't even have my learner's permit yet. How can I have a destiny?
Mr. Melancholy is coming.
He's already here. If we don't do something today--
--this world will be his.

This psychic plane isn't enough anymore. If we're going to defeat him this time, we're going to need to harness the full potential of our shared powers. We're going to need to meet again... in person.
Tara? Tara?!
Isabel?!
Isabel?!
